description: print information like size, creation date, legal tag(admin) for a space separated list of tenants, subprojects or datasets
help: print tenant information like esd and google project id.
print subproject information like storage location, legal tag(admin).
print dataset information like size, creation date, legal tag(admin).
| --idtoken=<token>  pass the credential token to use, rather than generating a new one
name: stat
